capability: Speed and course (velocity, direction of travel)
Compass heading (direction relative to magnetic and true north)
Visit monitoring (automatically detects arrivals/departures at precise locations)
Device Motion (sensor fusion: attitude, gravity-separated acceleration, rotation)
Pedometer (step count, distance, floors up/down, pace, cadence)
Activity Recognition (stationary, walking, running, cycling, automotive, unknown)
Barometric altimeter (relative altitude, atmospheric pressure in kPa)
Historical queries (can retrieve past pedometer and activity data)
Background capability (activity and pedometer work in background)
Heart rate (current, resting, walking average, workout)
Background delivery (can get notified of new data in background)
Calendar events (title, notes, location, start/end times)
Create, modify, delete events and reminders
Weather description (clear, cloudy, rain, snow, etc.)
Location-based (any coordinates, not just user location)
App usage time (per app, total duration)
App category usage (social, productivity, entertainment, games, etc.)
Web domain usage (websites visited, duration per domain)
Device pickups (count of times device was picked up)
First pickup time (when device first used each day)
App limits tracking (if user has set limits)
Now playing info (song, artist, album, artwork)
Audio level metering (input levels when recording)
Smart home device states (lights on/off, temperature, etc.)
Connected vehicle info (when CarPlay is active)
